pullrequest.title: Save models' material and meshes when logging targeting gazebo7

content.raw:
We have to find a way to passing in the `recordWithModel` variables from `Server.cc`. Therefore, I cannot just drop it from the `LogRecordParams` definition.  
I followed your suggestion by adding another `Start` function which takes a default value of `recordWithModel` as `false`    
Commit [d7ad6ff](#!/osrf/gazebo/commits/d7ad6ff2ced2aa59c2ea5663e4b993de35e1169c?at=gazebo7) reflects these changes
content.html:
We have to find a way to passing in the recordWithModel variables from Server.cc. Therefore, I cannot just drop it from the LogRecordParams definition.
I followed your suggestion by adding another Start function which takes a default value of recordWithModel as false
Commit d7ad6ff reflects these changes
